topic.title: Non-Human Subject Data Document Body - conformance rules

section.p: The single section which encompasses the data reported for a subject.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCSECT" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Contains exactly one [1..1] human Clinical Subject Demographics with data type Human Clinical Subject Demographics
Contains zero or more [0..*] human Clinical Visit with data type Visit
Contains exactly one [1..1] human Clinical Study Arm with data type Study Arm
Contains zero or more [0..*] exposureAssociation with data type exposure Association
Contains zero or more [0..*] subject Element with data type Subject Element
Contains zero or more [0..*] substance Use with data type Substance Use
Contains zero or more [0..*] disposition with data type Human Clinical Disposition
Contains zero or more [0..*] medical History with data type Medical History Item
Contains zero or more [0..*] protocol Deviation with data type Protocol Deviation
Contains zero or more [0..*] clinical Event with data type Clinical Event
Contains zero or more [0..*] eCG Test Result with data type ECG Test Result
Contains zero or one [0..1] subject Characteristic with data type Subject Characteristic
Contains zero or one [0..1] pharmacokinetic Parameter Finding with data type Pharmacokinetic Parameter Finding
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCSECT" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="TBD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Contains exactly one [1..1] human Clinical Subject Demographics with data type Human Clinical Subject Demographics
Contains zero or more [0..*] human Clinical Visit with data type Visit
Contains exactly one [1..1] human Clinical Study Arm with data type Study Arm
Contains zero or more [0..*] exposureAssociation with data type exposure Association
Contains zero or more [0..*] subject Element with data type Subject Element
Contains zero or more [0..*] substance Use with data type Substance Use
Contains zero or more [0..*] disposition with data type Human Clinical Disposition
Contains zero or more [0..*] medical History with data type Medical History Item
Contains zero or more [0..*] protocol Deviation with data type Protocol Deviation
Contains zero or more [0..*] clinical Event with data type Clinical Event
Contains zero or more [0..*] eCG Test Result with data type ECG Test Result
Contains zero or one [0..1] subject Characteristic with data type Subject Characteristic
Contains zero or one [0..1] pharmacokinetic Parameter Finding with data type Pharmacokinetic Parameter Finding
